subject: Fines (Penalties)
Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
lead_paragraph: Calvin Borel was fined and another rider, Javier Castellano, was fined and suspended for six days after a fight in the winner’s circle Friday at the Breeders’ Cup.
snippet: Calvin Borel was fined and another rider, Javier Castellano, was fined and suspended for six days after a fight in the winner’s circle Friday at the Breeders’ Cup.
